entry.title: First officialÂ meeting!
entry.summary:
Alright! So, we’ve got a time, date and location for the very first PyNQ meeting. Details are as follows:

First official meet-up
Riverview Tavern, Douglas - in Townsville
7pm, Wednesday 31 July 2013
Meeting for dinner, drinks and tech talk.

If you’re unsure where this is, check out the location on Google Maps.

Here’s the flyer:

Feel free to distribute this information far and wide if you’re interested. You can also obtain a higher-resolution image for the poster if you’d like to print it on A4 and stick it up around the place.

You can find the original artwork in the repository used for this blog - see about us for more information.

Hope to see you there! Make sure you tell your friends and help get them interested. If you can’t make it to this one, the aim is to hold some form of semi-regular get-together (perhaps every month or so). In any case, stay tuned to the blog and mailing list for more information. See about us for more information or the mailing list page for recent posts.
